Whether the Bluetooth is turned on？

We are well aware of the importance of privacy to you. In order to present our collection and use of your personal information more comprehensively, we have made detailed revisions to the Privacy Policy and User Agreement in accordance with the requirements of the latest laws and regulations. When you click [Agree], it means that you have fully read, understood and accepted the entire contents of the updated Privacy Policy and User Agreement. Please take some time to familiarize yourself with our Privacy Policy and please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

Are you sure you want to cancel？

Your account will be permanently deactivated after one week and all the following information in your account will be deleted, if you log in again before then, your deactivation request will be cancelled
Make sure submit a request to "cancel account" and it will be cancelled on %1s. During this time, if you log in to your account, your cancellation request will be revoked.
After the cancellation, the platform will delete all personal data under your account, if you want to cancel your request, you can do so by logging in before %1s.
You can retrieve the verification code after %1s seconds
Click "Get Verification Code" and the verification code will be sent to your %1s
The account has been cancelled, if you want to withdraw, please log in again
If you do not receive the verification code, we recommend you to confirm the following actions.
1. Please check if the country/region on the App registration page is selected correctly
2. Please check whether your phone is off or no network
3. Please check if the number/email you entered is correct
4. Please check whether your verification code is blocked or quarantined by the system
If the above confirmation is correct, or you cannot receive the verification code, can send email to

We sent a %1s-digit verification code to %1s

Please enter the correct format email address username@dominename.com
The password length is between 8 and 20 characters, Contains two types of characters, number, upper and lowercase, and symbols: !@#$%^&*()._-

The password length is 6-20 characters, must contain letters, numbers, and supports special characters: !@#$%^&*()._-

Special Offer on First Cloud Storage Purchase
To avoid too frequent reminders, the reminder will not be triggered until the device is offline for more than 30 minutes (low-power devices will trigger the reminder after more than 8 hours)
Place your phone close to the device
Select the Wi-Fi and enter the password
Click on the "+" in the device list to add a device
Bluetooth is currently turned off, turn it on to scan?
Device is being added, do you want to exit?
Device may be in the process of being added. If you confirm out, please follow the procedure to reset the device the next time you add it
May sure device is near phone
The currently connected 5GHz WiFi may cause adding a device to fail, continue? (Recommend switching to 2.4GHz WiFi)
The phone is not connected to WiFi
If you want to bind the device, you need to put the device in the wiring mode
What should I do if the scan fails?
Probably due to the current network environment is poor or has been bind by others.
1. Make sure the distance between the phone and the device is close enough and there is no strong interference in the surrounding network environment.
2. Make sure the location permission of the app is open.

3. If you still can\'t find the device, it may be because the device has been bind by someone else. If you are not sure who has bound the device, you can reset it, please refer to the manual or select "manually add" device in the app and follow the guide.
4. Bluetooth devices, please check whether the device is normally powered on, or phone Bluetooth has been opened.
Please keep your mobile phone close to the device and router and keep the network normal.
The device is being connected, please wait a moment.
The mobile phone system version is too low to add the Matter device through the current network distribution method. Please upgrade the system to iOS16.1 and above.
Connect mobile phone WiFi to the device hotspot
1. Please connect your mobile phone to the hotspot shown in the figure below.
2. Return to this application and continue to add the device. If the local network permissions are not turned on, it will cause the device to fail to access the network.
2. Return to this application and continue to add devices
Make sure that the connection hotspot is correct and continue to the next step.
The device has been bound by other users, please unbind it first.
You need to add a gateway before adding sub-devices.
Turn on Bluetooth to make your device easier to discover.
No devices found, you can manually add from the list below.
Videos longer than 20 seconds cannot be sent.
Device has been shared with the following%1sAPP users
Are you sure you want to remove the shared device?
The current device does not support this sharing method temporarily
Bluetooth Mesh, Single Bluetooth, Gateway, and other devices do not support sharing with other users through this method.
It is recommended to add family member sharing
Please add members through the family management entrance. After adding, you can share devices under the family in batches.
Are you sure you want to unbind the device?
Are you sure to unbind and clear the data?
After the device is unbound, the related "automations" scenes will not be available.
The device will be reset to factory settings, removed from the device list, and all device-related data will be cleared.
Shared gateway sub-devices do not support removing sharing
Choose an app enabled with Matter to control and manage this device, or use a code link or invite others
%1s is now in pairing mode, you can connect the device by scanning. This QR code will expire in 15 minutes, please do not exit this screen before sharing is complete, as it may fail.

%1s is already in pairing mode, and you can connect the device by copying and pasting the pairing code. This QR code will expire in 15 minutes. Please do not exit this screen before the sharing is complete, or the sharing may fail.
Device is offline, sharing not supported
This is a local group, please wait for the gateway response
Confirm group dissolution which will remove it from the scene?
Confirm device unbinding which will remove it from the scene and group?
Confirm device unbinding and data clearance which will remove it from the scene and group?
No gateway devices available for replacement
Please select a gateway to replace
Request failed, please go back and retry
Note: When scanning or entering a pairing code, the sharer\'s network must be on the same local network as the recipient\'s
The device is not in the current home
Before adding, please go to system settings to enable "%1s" to create desktop shortcuts, otherwise addition will fail.
Please go to system settings to enable "%1s" to create desktop shortcuts

Make sure the device is powered on
The upgrade may take a long time, please ensure that the device is fully charged, and the device cannot be used during the upgrade.

With Two-Step Verification, you’ll need both your password and a cerification code when logging in from an unrecognized device.A verification code will be sent to the account email.
Your account trusts the following device, you can delete the device, and after deleting, Two-Step Verification is required when logging in on this device.
After deleting, Two-Step Verification will be required for your next login.
